usage: mc [-h]
          {watch,list,web,context,summary,intent,harness,checkpoint,checkpoints,rollback,diff,history,teleport}
          ...

Motus Command: Command Center for AI Agents.
Run 'mc' with no arguments for interactive TUI dashboard.
Run 'mc web' for web dashboard at http://127.0.0.1:4000
Run 'mc --help' for a list of commands.

positional arguments:
  {watch,list,web,context,summary,intent,harness,checkpoint,checkpoints,rollback,diff,history,teleport}
                        Available commands
    watch               Watch a session in real-time
    list                List recent sessions
    web                 Launch web dashboard at http://127.0.0.1:4000
    context             Generate context summary for AI agent prompts
    summary             Generate a rich summary for CLAUDE.md injection
    intent              Extract/show intent from a session
    harness             Detect test harness for a repository
    checkpoint          Create a state checkpoint
    checkpoints         List all available checkpoints
    rollback            Restore state to a previous checkpoint
    diff                Show changes between current state and a checkpoint
    history             Show command history
    teleport            Export a session bundle for cross-session context
                        transfer

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
usage: mc list [-h]

options:
  -h, --help  show this help message and exit
usage: mc web [-h]

options:
  -h, --help  show this help message and exit
usage: mc [-h]
          {watch,list,web,context,summary,intent,harness,checkpoint,checkpoints,rollback,diff,history,teleport}
          ...
mc: error: unrecognized arguments: --version
Version: 0.4.0
